snippet: Nearly half the people in the country are now facing hunger, the main food aid agency of the United Nations said Wednesday.
abstract: United Nations reports almost 2.5 million people in Central African Republic are facing hunger, about half country's population and double number from year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Nearly half the people in the country are now facing hunger, the main food aid agency of the United Nations said Wednesday.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Hunger Threatens Population, U.N. Warns
headline.print_headline: Africa; Central African Republic: Hunger Threatens Population, U.N. Warns
